name: SD Gundam Eiyuuden: Musha Densetsu
overview: Released simultaneously with SD Gundam Eiyuuden: Kishi Densetsu, the two initially start out as separate stories with completely different worldviews, but as the story approaches the end, both stories are combined to an unified ending. Musha Densetsu begins when the Tengen General and Tengu are suddenly attacked by the revived Zard Army. The Tennomiya Army manages to attack the Zard Army with the help of their young warriors. Among them, the one that took over the warrior Gundam has the power to overwhelm the leader Zanche of the Four Heavenly Kings of the Zade Eastern Invasion Army.
